message.body: Happy Birthday to you, Buon compleanno a te, Joyeux anniversaire, Michael, Happy Birthday to you!
Thank you. #############. You sure know how to wish a linguaphile a happy birthday :)
Ahaha.. you're welcome. ##############. (French has alot of ways to says alot of phrases, lol) I picked a short informal one just now, don't know if that's right
Haha yeah they do. De rien is right
Ok cool lol. I realized after I sent it that I could have made the second English line Portuguese instead. But oh well, next year lol
Haha I'll be waiting for it
